targets.expr: sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}",status_code=~"2..|3..", status_code!= "total"}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}", status_code!= "total"}[5m]))

sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}",status_code!~"2..|3..|5..|total"}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left  sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}", status_code!= "total"}[5m]))

sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}",status_code!~"2..|3..|4..|total"}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left  sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{api=~"${api}", status_code!= "total"}[5m]))
